overview: The thoughts of a man who lives and films in his studio of images and sounds, disconnected from any social or family environment. “In a world in search of meaning, in love with men of action, professing speeches that are addressed to all, I make films that militate for disengagement, inaction, waste of time. Can we live like a flower, like a cicada or a cricket?” (Francis Brou)
title: The World Mutates
